Reviews.Title: Good Pc for the price
Reviews.Author: Isaac
Reviews.Content: This Laptop has been fairly well used because of the time i spend in school, as well as some social media sites. For the price it it a good buy but if you need something that's beefier. I would suggest picking something up that has a dedicated graphics card or at least an APU with an A-8 4500.

Reviews.Title: Replacement
Reviews.Author: Deborah Berry
Reviews.Content: My replacement came & it is working fine.  I returned the one that did not work properly. the DVD player would not open & the keyboard keystrokes stuck.Thank you for making my return & replacement promptly.Deborah

ProductInfo.Features:
AMD Quad Core A4-5000 1.5 GHz Processor
4 GB DIMM RAM
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen, AMD Radeon HD 8330
Windows 8.1, 5.25-hour battery life
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite C55D-A5146 15.6-Inch Laptop
